English: Man, things have gotten pretty nuts around here!
Chinese: 唉呀，好像變成很不得了的事情啊。
German: Mann, was ist hier bloß los!

English:
All the hackers are talking about the breaking up
of Zaxon. It's all I hear about these days.
Chinese:
駭客間都在談論Zaxon會分裂的事，
不論走到哪，全都是這個話題。
Korean:
해커들 사이에선 잭슨 분열 이야기로 소문이 자자해.
어딜 가든 그 얘기 뿐이야
German:
Alle Hacker reden über die Spaltung von Zaxon.
Es gibt kein anderes Thema mehr.

English: Did you find out anything about K?
Chinese: 關於K，你知道些什麼了嗎？
German: Hast du etwas über K herausgefunden?

English:
Not a daaang thing. This guy...he might be a
pretty tough customer.
Chinese:
沒有，完～全不知道。
……這傢伙說不定是個相當難纏的對象喔。
Korean:
아아니, 전혀.
……이 녀석 꽤 벅찬 상대일지도 모르겠는걸
German:
Nein, rein gar nichts. Gut möglich, dass er
ein ziemlich taffer Typ ist.

English:
If he's not getting picked up by my intelligence
network, then he hasn't been around long.
Chinese:
從我的情報網淘不出消息，
肯定就不是老駭客了。
Korean:
내 정보망에 전혀 걸리지 않는다니
고참 해커가 아닌 건 분명하겠네
German:
Wenn meine Informanten nichts wissen, gibt es
ihn noch nicht lange.

English: Has he contacted you since then, [p]?
Chinese:
[p]，
從那之後，那傢伙還有跟你連絡嗎？

English: Really... Then we'll just have to wait and see.
Chinese:
這樣啊……
現在，只能先靜觀其變了嗎……
Korean:
그런가……
지금은 상황을 살필 수밖에 없겠네……
German: Wirklich ... Dann müssen wir einfach abwarten.

English:
...It's the hospital. Erika got approval to be
discharged.
Chinese:
……從醫院打來的，
艾莉卡可以出院了。
German:
... Das war das Krankenhaus. Erika kann
entlassen werden.

English: Oh, great! Glad to hear it didn't take too long!
Chinese: 喔喔，這次沒有拖太久真是太好了呢！
German:
Fantastisch! Ich bin froh, dass es schnell
gegangen ist!

English:
...Still, that K guy. I wonder why he called you
over to the Demons?
Chinese:
……話說回來，“K”那傢伙
把你叫去惡魔亂舞的目的到底是什麼啊？
Korean:
……그런데 "K"란 녀석.
뭘 위해 너를 데몬즈로 불러낸 걸까?
German:
... Aber dieser Typ, K. Ich frage mich, warum er
dich zu den Demons beordert hat?

English:
For now, we know that neither of K's targets--
Shiga or Kayaba--were the criminal...
Chinese:
目前被K鎖定過的目標，
志賀和茅場都不是犯人……
Korean:
현재로선 K가 타깃으로 지명한
시가도 카야바도 범인이 아니었고……
German:
Bis jetzt wissen wir, dass keins der Ziele von
K – Shiga oder Kayaba – der Verbrecher war ...

English:
Was he giving you wrong intel to confuse you? And
if so, for what purpose?
Chinese:
打算提供錯誤情報來擾亂你之類的嗎？
如果真是如此，到底有什麼目的……？
Korean:
잘못된 정보를 제공해서 너를 혼란에 빠뜨리는 거라던가?
혹시 그렇다면 대체 뭐가 목적이지……?
German:
Hat er dir falsche Informationen gegeben, um dich
zu verwirren? Und wenn ja, zu welchem Zweck?
